content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I am your virtual assistant. May I have your name, please?
Nice to meet you, Linda! Can you please provide your service address so I can check if we're able to assist you?
Thank you, Linda. Let me quickly check if you're within our service area.
Great news, Linda! We can provide plumbing services at your address. What day and time would be ideal for you to have a technician come by?
Actually, I’m still considering a few options and want to get quotes from other companies first. I’m not ready to book an appointment right now.
I understand, Linda. It’s important to explore your options. Please feel free to contact us anytime when you’re ready to schedule. Have a great day!
reason: Customer wants to get quotes from other companies first
